const int mod = 1e9+7;
const int N = 2e2+10;
const int inf = 2e9;
const double eps = 1e-7;
const long long INF = (long long)1e18;
/* -------Template ends here-------- */ 
int dp[211][111][111][5];
int val[] = {0,1,2,4,6};
int t;
int solve(int a,int b, int tot , int rep)
{
	if(a < 0 || b < 0 || rep ==3)
		return 0;
	if( tot >= 100)return 1;
	
	if(a == 0)return 0; // no ball left
	
	if(dp[a][b][tot][rep] != -1)return dp[a][b][tot][rep];
	
	ll ans = 0;
	for(int i=0;i<5;i++)
	{
		if(i==0)
			ans += solve(a-1,b,tot,rep+1);
		else
			ans += solve(a-1,b,tot+val[i],0);
	}
	for(int i=0;i<5;i++)
		ans += solve(a,b-1,tot+val[i],rep);
	ans %= mod;
	
	return dp[a][b][tot][rep] = ans;
}
int main()
{	
	int b,n;
	si(t);
	memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>b>>n;
		cout<<solve(b,n,0,0)<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
